title: COOFANDY Men's 3 Pack Workout Gym Shorts Mesh Athletic Shorts Lightweight Bodybuilding Training Short Pants with Pockets
description: 【Comfortable and Breathable】 COOFANDY men's athletic shorts are made from lightweight mesh fabric, ensuring maximum comfort and breathability. this active shorts are super breathable and always keep you dry during intense exercise sessions.

【Versatile Design】 men's gym shorts with solid colors design, 5 inch inseam, 2 pockets on side seam to store all of your small essentials, and elastic waistband with adjustable internal drawstring for comfort fit.
【Functional Matching】With a sleek and simple looks, You can easily pair those running shorts with tank tops, t-shirts, or sleeveless hoodies for a trendy and sporty look.

【Durable and Reliable】Mens workout shorts are built to last. making them ideal for various activities such as workout, gym, running, fitness, bodybuilding, boxing wear, jogging, training, weightlifting, squats, cycling and more even the most intense workouts.
【Note】For a looser fit, we recommend going One size up. Plus, those basketball shorts are easy to care for with machine washability.
